items.title: TXT Confirmed To Make April Comeback
items.summary: On February 5, Sports Seoul reported that TXT has confirmed plans to make a comeback in April and is currently focusing on album preparations.  In response to the report, their agency BIGHIT MUSIC confirmed, â€œTXT is working on their album with the goal of making a comeback in April.â€ The representative added, â€œThe detailed schedule will be officially announced at a later date. We ask for your anticipation and support.â€  This will mark their first comeback in about nine months. The group last released their fourth full-length album â€œThe Star Chapter: TOGETHERâ€ in July of last year, which concluded â€œThe Star Chapterâ€ series.
